markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [King Harral](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1570) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 42 **Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +29, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +25, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +25, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +23 **Str** +6 **Dex** +5 **Con** +0 **Int** +7 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +7 **Items** _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _+2 [thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306) [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [maul](/Weapons.aspx?ID=33)_, _[wand of smoldering fireballs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=372)_ (7th-level [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)) --- **AC** 35 **Fort** +22 **Ref** +24 **Will** +28 +1 status to all saves vs. [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) **HP** 195 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralysis](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10, physical 10 (except magic bludgeoning) **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 60 feet, DC 33
**Rejuvenation** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 24 hours after King Harral is destroyed, his body rebuilds itself on his throne (or, if the throne is destroyed, on the site where the throne once sat), similarly to how a [lich's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=282) body is restored via its soul cage. If all of Saggorak's buildings are destroyed, or if heroes perform a great service in saving Saggorak (see Concluding the Adventure), King Harral loses this ability.
**Counterspell** **Trigger** A creature casts a spell King Harral has prepared. **Effect** The king expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. He can then attempt to dispel the triggering spell. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _thundering maul_ +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d12+12 bludgeoning plus 1d6 sonic **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 35, attack +27 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) - **2nd** [Deafness](/Spells.aspx?ID=62), [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (×2), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) - **5th** [Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23) (×2), [Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) - **6th** [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) (×2), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353), [Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=363) - **7th** [Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261) **Steady Spellcasting** If another creature's reaction would disrupt King Harral's spell, he attempts a DC 15 flat check. If he succeeds, the spell isn't disrupted.
name: King Harral

text: King Harral Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 42 Unspecific Lore : DC 40 Specific Lore : DC 37 King Harral Source Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 42 Perception +25; darkvision Languages Aklo, Celestial, Draconic, Dwarven, Necril, Undercommon Skills Arcana +29, Crafting +25, Diplomacy +27, Intimidation +27, Religion +25, Society +23 Str +6 Dex +5 Con +0 Int +7 Wis +5 Cha +7 Items +1 resilient full plate , +2 thundering striking maul , wand of smoldering fireballs (7th-level fireball ) --- AC 35 Fort +22 Ref +24 Will +28 +1 status to all saves vs. positive HP 195 (negative healing, rejuvenation) Immunities death effects, disease, paralysis, poison, unconscious Resistances cold 10, physical 10 (except magic bludgeoning) Frightful Presence (aura, emotion, fear, mental) 60 feet, DC 33 Rejuvenation (arcane, necromancy) 24 hours after King Harral is destroyed, his body rebuilds itself on his throne (or, if the throne is destroyed, on the site where the throne once sat), similarly to how a lich's body is restored via its soul cage. If all of Saggorak's buildings are destroyed, or if heroes perform a great service in saving Saggorak (see Concluding the Adventure), King Harral loses this ability. Counterspell Reaction Trigger A creature casts a spell King Harral has prepared. Effect The king expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. He can then attempt to dispel the triggering spell. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action thundering maul +28 (Magical, Shove), Damage 2d12+12 bludgeoning plus 1d6 sonic Arcane Prepared Spells DC 35, attack +27 - Cantrips (7th) Detect Magic, Electric Arc, Mage Hand, Message, Shield - 1st Fleet Step, Ray of Enfeeblement (×2), True Strike - 2nd Deafness, False Life, Mirror Image, See Invisibility - 3rd Blindness, Magic Missile (×2), Vampiric Touch - 4th Dimension Door, Fire Shield, Fly, Freedom of Movement - 5th Black Tentacles (×2), Cloudkill, Dispel Magic - 6th Disintegrate (×2), Vampiric Exsanguination, Wall of Force - 7th Duplicate Foe, Eclipse Burst, Reverse Gravity Steady Spellcasting If another creature's reaction would disrupt King Harral's spell, he attempts a DC 15 flat check. If he succeeds, the spell isn't disrupted.
